TimePeriod.description: The time period of the report

AccountId.description: ID of the account associated with the data

AccountNumber.description: Number of the account associated with the data

AccountName.description: Name of the account associated with the data

DestinationUrl.description: URL where the ad directs the user

SearchQuery.description: The search query entered by the user

Network.description: The network where the ad was displayed

TotalClicksOnAdElements.description: Total number of clicks on elements within the ad

AdGroupCriterionId.description: Unique ID for the ad group criterion

Impressions.description: Total number of times the ad was shown

Clicks.description: Total number of clicks on the ad

AverageCpc.description: Average cost per click for the ad

Spend.description: Total amount spent on the ad

Conversions.description: Total number of times the ad resulted in a conversion

ConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for the ad

Assists.description: Number of times the ad assisted in converting a customer

CostPerAssist.description: Cost per assist where the ad assisted in converting a customer

Revenue.description: Total revenue generated by the ad

CostPerConversion.description: Cost per conversion for the ad

RevenuePerConversion.description: Average revenue per conversion for the ad

RevenuePerAssist.description: Average revenue per assist where the ad assisted in converting a customer

AssistedImpressions.description: Number of times the ad appeared in a measured position on the search results page but wasn't clicked

AssistedClicks.description: Number of clicks in which the ad appeared in a measured position on the search results page but wasn't clicked

AssistedConversions.description: Number of conversions in which the ad appeared in a measured position on the search results page but wasn't clicked

AllConversions.description: Total number of all types of conversions

AllRevenue.description: Total revenue generated from all types of conversions

AllConversionRate.description: The overall conversion rate for all types of conversions

AllCostPerConversion.description: Total cost per conversion for all types of conversions

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: Average revenue earned per conversion for all types of conversions

Goal.description: The goal associated with the ad

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of times this ad was shown in the top position on the search results page

ConversionsQualified.description: Number of conversions that meet certain criteria

AssistedConversionsQualified.description: Number of conversions that meet certain criteria in which the ad appeared in a measured position on the search results page but wasn't clicked

AllConversionsQualified.description: Number of all types of conversions that meet certain criteria
